article: the taipei city government began the challenging task monday of moving the nearly ###-year-old taipei workshop -- a train manufacturing and repair facility located near the north gate in downtown taipei -- ## meters to the southeast in an effort to save the historic relic during the construction of a new mass rapid transit -lrb- mrt -rrb- line .
